ethic_fanatic_authoritarian.zhcn_desc: §L同一个声音，同一个权力，同一个国家。所有的民众，都有着庄严的义务去服从明智的少数人。而这些少数人承担了领导民众的巨大责任。§!\n
ethic_fanatic_authoritarian.en_desc: §LA single voice, a single throne, a single state. It is the solemn duty of the masses to obey those enlightened few who have been charged with the great responsibility of leadership.§!\n
ethic_fanatic_authoritarian.instruction: §E允许§H阶层经济§!生活标准§!\n§E可以§H奴役§!外星人§!\n§E必须拥有§H专制型§!政体§!
ethic_fanatic_authoritarian.zhcn_country_modifier: 每月影响力：§G+1§!\n劳工基础资源产出：§G+10%§!

ethic_authoritarian.zhcn_desc: §L一个强大的能起引导作用的力量，对于任何文明的成功都是至关重要的——否则国家将陷入无政府与混乱。领导民众走向生产力最高的道路是国家的职责。§!\n
ethic_authoritarian.en_desc: §LA strong, guiding hand is essential to the success of any civilization - the alternative would be anarchy and chaos. It is the duty of the state to steer its citizens towards the paths that are the most productive.§!\n
ethic_authoritarian.instruction: §E允许§H阶层经济§!生活标准§!\n§E可以§H奴役§!外星人§!\n§E不能使用§H民主型§!政体§!
ethic_authoritarian.zhcn_country_modifier: 每月影响力：§G+0.5§!\n劳工基础资源产出：§G+5%§!

ethic_fanatic_egalitarian.zhcn_desc: §L时刻警惕那些会成为独裁者的人，在他们错误的假定中，个人的欲望与事项凌驾于他们的追随者之上。一个不重视其所有成员需求和利益的社会不是社会——而是一个犯罪组织。§!\n
ethic_fanatic_egalitarian.en_desc: §LBeware always those who would be despots, under the false presumption that their desires and agendas are somehow more imperative than those of their fellows. A society that does not see to the needs and rights of all of its members is not a society - it is a crime.§!\n
ethic_fanatic_egalitarian.instruction: §E必须拥有§H民主型§!政体§!\n§E允许§H乌托邦§!生活标准§!
ethic_fanatic_egalitarian.zhcn_country_modifier: 派系影响力收入：§G+50%§!\n专家产出：§G+10%§!

ethic_egalitarian.zhcn_desc: §L平等的社会中所有个体都应当能通过足够努力的工作获得更高的地位。任何拒绝信奉其成员应当平等的社会，不仅严重缺乏公正，更是彻底误入歧途。§!\n
ethic_egalitarian.en_desc: §LAny society that does not embrace equality between its members - where an individual can rise to any position with enough hard work - is not only deeply unfair, but ultimately counterproductive.§!\n
ethic_egalitarian.instruction: §E不能使用§H专制型§!政体§!\n§E允许§H乌托邦§!生活标准§!
ethic_egalitarian.zhcn_country_modifier: 派系影响力收入：§G+25%§!\n专家产出：§G+5%§!

ethic_fanatic_xenophobe.zhcn_desc: §L宇宙是一片黑暗森林，每一个文明都是带着猎枪的猎人。我们没有义务也没有可能信任任何外星人，生存才是文明的第一需求。§!\n
ethic_fanatic_xenophobe.en_desc: §LAny alien influence must be ruthlessly quashed. Only by staying pure, and true to ourselves and the planet that gave us life can we guard against insidious Xeno plots. Even mastery over the Alien might not be enough to guarantee our own safety...§!\n
ethic_fanatic_xenophobe.instruction:
§E可以§H净化§!异星物种§!
§E可以§H奴役§!外星人§!
§E降低其他物种对我们的§H评价§!§!
§E不可赋予外星人§H完整公民权§!§!
§E不可允许外星人§H无限制入伍§!§!
§E不能使用§H欢迎难民§!物种政策§!
ethic_fanatic_xenophobe.zhcn_country_modifier: 恒星基地影响力花费：§G-40%§!\n人口增长速度：§G+20%§!

ethic_xenophobe.zhcn_desc: §L不相信任何外星生物，不愿意探索未知星系。§!
ethic_xenophobe.en_desc: §LThe stakes could not be higher as we reach into the vast uncharted expanses of the galaxy, for we are gambling with the very survival of our species! Never trust the alien; its false smile hides an unknowable mind...§!\n
ethic_xenophobe.instruction:
§E可以§H净化§!异星物种§!
§E可以§H奴役§!外星人§!
§E降低其他物种对我们的§H评价§!§!
§E不可赋予外星人§H完整公民权§!§!

§E不能使用§H欢迎难民§!物种政策§!
ethic_xenophobe.zhcn_country_modifier: 恒星基地影响力花费：§G-20%§!\n人口增长速度：§G+10%§!

ethic_fanatic_xenophile.zhcn_desc: §L如果在我们的社会中存在一个绝对的道德法则，那就是探索深空与外星人，并与他们融为一体。星海漫漫，但我们从不孤独。§!\n
ethic_fanatic_xenophile.en_desc: §LIf there ever was such a thing as an absolute moral imperative, it would be to explore the cosmos and embrace all within it. We were never meant to journey alone.§!\n
ethic_fanatic_xenophile.instruction:
§E提升其他物种对我们的§H评价§!§!
§E不能使用§H禁止难民§!物种政策§!
§E不能§H奴役§!整个物种§!
§E无法§H驱逐§!异星物种§!
ethic_fanatic_xenophile.zhcn_country_modifier: 贸易额：§G+20%§!\n外交影响力花费：§G-50%§!

ethic_xenophile.zhcn_desc: §L我们的内心中都存在着一份对于未知的好奇心，我们愿意与任何物种建立交流，来让自己知道得更多，了解得更多。§!\n
ethic_xenophile.en_desc: §LThere exists, in all of us, a deep-seated fascination for the unknown. An adventurous spirit that rejects the familiar and glories in the unfamiliar, whatever - or whomever - it may be.§!\n
ethic_xenophile.instruction:
§E提升其他物种对我们的§H评价§!§!
§E不能使用§H禁止难民§!物种政策§!
§E不能§H奴役§!整个物种§!
§E无法§H驱逐§!异星物种§!
ethic_xenophile.zhcn_country_modifier: 贸易额：§G+10%§!\n外交影响力花费：§G-25%§!

ethic_fanatic_militarist.zhcn_desc: §L在这个无助的深空中，没有什么比武力更具备话语权。这个宇宙不是一个摇篮，也没有任何的道德约束。§!\n
ethic_fanatic_militarist.en_desc: §LThe ability to project force is of paramount importance. The only way to preserve our way of life is to make sure everyone shares it; willingly or not...§!\n
ethic_fanatic_militarist.instruction: §E可以使用§H宁死不撤§!战争学说§!
ethic_fanatic_militarist.zhcn_country_modifier: 宣称影响力花费：§G-20%§!\n舰船武器射速：§G+20%§!

ethic_militarist.zhcn_desc: §L我们相信唯一的真正的美德是勇气和纪律，武装力量能够更好地保护自己，胜过任何脆弱的约定与诺言。§!\n
ethic_militarist.en_desc: §LThe only true virtues are courage and discipline, and channeled properly they can overcome any obstacle. Therein lies true strength; force withheld, a promise made.§!\n
ethic_militarist.instruction: §E可以使用§H宁死不撤§!战争学说§!
ethic_militarist.zhcn_country_modifier: 宣称影响力花费：§G-10%§!\n舰船武器射速：§G+10%§!

ethic_fanatic_pacifist.zhcn_desc: §L作为文明的化身，我们认为武力无法解决任何问题，战争只能带来痛苦与死亡，所有人都会因此付出巨大而无谓的代价。§!\n
ethic_fanatic_pacifist.en_desc: §LAs civilized beings, the end of all armed conflict should be our primary concern. War is an evolutionary dead end, as futile as it is wasteful.§!\n
ethic_fanatic_pacifist.instruction: §E必须使用§H仅限防御战争§!政策§!\n§E无法进行§H无差别§!轨道轰炸§!

ethic_pacifist.zhcn_desc: §L我们认为任何事情都可以被和平地解决，冲突带来的结果是破坏性的，甚至会破坏我们互相争夺的东西。§!\n
ethic_pacifist.en_desc: §LConflict as a means to an end is a ridiculous concept. It is by nature destructive, destroying what was to be obtained or giving room to grow that which was to be destroyed.§!\n
ethic_pacifist.instruction: §E不能使用§H无限制战争§!政策§!\n§E无法进行§H无差别§!轨道轰炸§!

ethic_fanatic_spiritualist.zhcn_desc: §L我们的科学已经证明了意识乃现实之父。我们耐心的审视那些用其他的世界观欺骗自己的人，他们做着孩童般幼稚的努力，翻弄着他们的一块块“实在的物质”。§!\n
ethic_fanatic_spiritualist.en_desc: §LOur science has proved that Consciousness begets reality. We regard with patience the childlike efforts of those who delude themselves it is the other way around, as they play with their blocks of "hard matter."§!\n
ethic_fanatic_spiritualist.instruction: §E可以建造§H寺庙§!§!\n§E无法使用§H人工智能完整公民权§!政策§!

ethic_spiritualist.zhcn_desc: §L有人认为我们应当记住我们是如何的藐小，我们的生命在巨大而冷漠的宇宙中是如何的没有意义……这是多么的不可理喻！我们能够所知的的唯一真相就是我们的存在。宇宙——无论它拥有多少浮于表面的称颂——也不过是我们偶然分享的梦境而已。§!\n
ethic_spiritualist.en_desc: §LThere are those who think it behooves us to remember how tiny we are, how pointless our lives are in this vast uncaring universe... What nonsense! The only truth we can ever know is that of our own existence. The universe - in all its apparent glory - is but a dream we all happen to share.§!\n
ethic_spiritualist.instruction: §E可以建造§H寺庙§!§!\n§E无法使用§H人工智能完整公民权§!政策§!

ethic_fanatic_materialist.zhcn_desc: §L尽管这很残酷，但是我们必须成长起来，抛弃我们过时的道德观念。没有所谓的“神圣的思维火花”赋予生命体某种特殊的价值。除了我们选择授予的，没有任何东西拥有内在的独一无二的价值。让我们拥抱确信的自由，然后在所有的方面都达到最高的效率！§!\n
ethic_fanatic_materialist.en_desc: §LAlthough it hurts, we must grow up and put aside our outdated notions of morality. There is no "divine spark" granting special value to a living mind. No object has any intrinsic value apart from what we choose to grant it. Let us embrace the freedom of certitude, and achieve maximum efficiency in all things!§!\n
ethic_fanatic_materialist.instruction: §E允许§H学术特权§!的生活标准§!\n§E无法使用§H宣布人工智能非法§!的政策§!\n§E无法使用§H宣布机器人劳工非法§!政策§!
ethic_fanatic_materialist.zhcn_country_modifier: 机器人维护费：§G-20%§!\n研究速度：§G+10%§!

ethic_materialist.zhcn_desc: §L我们认为在一个物种接触太空时就必须抛开所有幼稚的事物，比如宗教与神明这种虚幻的东西。现实是残酷而无情的，我们坚定信心，通过对科学的坚定不移的追求来切实维护族群的生存空间。§!\n
ethic_materialist.en_desc: §LAs we reach for the stars, we must put away childish things; gods, spirits and other phantasms of the brain. Reality is cruel and unforgiving, yet we must steel ourselves and secure the survival of our race through the unflinching pursuit of science and technology.§!\n
ethic_materialist.instruction: §E允许§H学术特权§!的生活标准§!\n§E无法使用§H宣布人工智能非法§!的政策§!\n§E无法使用§H宣布机器人劳工非法§!政策§!
ethic_materialist.zhcn_country_modifier: 机器人维护费：§G-10%§!\n研究速度：§G+5%§!
